posts.post_content:
I have a collection of 27 of the 30 Detroit Tigers T206 cards

It contains the Ty Cobb "On" in SGC 3 grade, Other highlights include some really nice SGC 5 Crawfords, with an elite 11 Germany Schaefer, along with some different backs, Tolstoi, Old Mill, Sovereign

asking $11,900 Pay Pall FF, plus $20 shipping
Pics are on Ebay, title "Detroit Tigers T206 Collection"

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/Detroit-Tigers-T206-Collection/134100823857[/url]

Admittedly more for bigger collectors or those wanting to collect the entire set, but do not want to break it up

My email is [url]mark.sobie@gmail.com[/url] if you want additional scans, or if my responses within this site not getting to you

That is a beautiful set!

Are the remaining three cards to complete the set all Cobb variations?

Thank you!

Yes missing:
Cobb Red & Green Portrait 
Cobb bat off
